verses.text: ‘I HONO tolu ta‘u ‘o e pule ‘a Sihoiakimi ko e Tu‘i Siuta na‘e a‘u ki Selusalema ‘a Nepukanesa ko e Tu‘i Pāpilone, ‘o ne tau‘i ia.

Pea na‘e tuku ‘e ‘Ātonai ki hono nima ‘a Sihoiakimi ko e Tu‘i Siuta, mo e nāunau ni‘ihi ‘o e fale ‘o ‘Elohimi: pea na‘a ne ‘ave ia ki he fonua ko Saina ki he fale ‘o hono ‘otua, pea na‘a ne fakahū ‘a e nāunau ki he fale koloa ‘o hono ‘Otua.
Pea folofola ‘a e Tu‘i kia ‘Asipenasi ko e pule ‘o ‘ene kau ‘iunoke, ke ‘omi ha ni‘ihi ‘o ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘io, mei he hako ‘o e tu‘i mo e hou‘eiki;

koni talavou ‘oku ‘ikai hanau mele, pea faka‘ofo‘ofa, kuo loto matala ki he poto kehekehe mo ‘ilome‘a, ‘oku nau malava ‘a e sivi ‘o e ngaahi fakakaukau, pea ‘oku ai ha‘anau mafai ke fakafe‘ao ‘i he palasi ‘o e tu‘i; pea ke nau ako kinautolu ‘i he poto mo e lea ‘a e kau Kalitia.

Pea na‘e vahe ma‘anautolu ‘e he tu‘i hanau ‘oho ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē mei he ‘inasi ‘o e tu‘i, pea mei he kava na‘a ne inu, ke tauhi ‘aki kinautolu ‘o tolu ta‘u; pea hili ia ke nau tu‘u ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e tu‘i.
Pea ‘iate kinautolu mei ha‘a Siuta na‘e ‘i ai ‘a Tāniela, ‘Ananaia, Misaeli, mo ‘Asalaia.
Pea ko e ‘eiki ‘o e kau ‘iunoke na‘a ne fakahingoa kinautolu; ‘o ne ui ‘a Tāniela ko Pelitisasa, pea ko ‘Ananaia na‘a ne ui ko Setaleki, pea ko Misaeli ko Mēsake, pea ko ‘Asalaia ko ‘Apitenikō.
Ka na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Tāniela ‘i hono loto ‘e ‘ikai te ne tuku ke ‘uli‘i ‘aki ‘a e ‘inasi ‘o e tu‘i, pe ko e kava ‘oku ne inu; ko ia na‘a ne kole ki he ‘eiki ‘o e kau ‘iunoke ke ne ‘atā mei ai.
Pea kuo tuku ‘e ‘Elohimi ke lelei‘ia ‘a e ‘eiki ‘o e kau ‘iunoke ‘ia Tāniela, pea ke ne mātu‘aki ‘ofa ki ai.

Pea tali ‘e he ‘eiki ‘o e kau ‘iunoke kia Tāniela, ‘Oku ou manavahē telia hoku ‘eiki ko e tu‘i, ‘aiakuo ne vahe ho‘omou me‘akai mo homou inu; he koe‘uma‘ā ke ne me‘a ki homou mata ‘oku kovi hifo ‘i he kau talavou ‘oku mou to‘ume‘a? Pea ngali tu‘utāmaki ai hoku ‘ulu mei he tu‘i ‘iate kimoutolu.
Pea lea ‘a Tāniela ki he sētuata, ‘a ia kuo vahe ‘e he ‘eiki ‘o e kau ‘iunoke kia Tāniela, ‘Ananaia, Misaeli, mo ‘Asalaia,
‘o pehē, Fakamolemole, ka ke ‘ahi‘ahi ho‘o kau tamaio‘eiki ko kimautolu ‘o ‘aho hongofulu; ‘o ‘omi mohuku kai pē ke mau tokoni ‘aki, mo e vai moomau inu.
Pea ke toki sivi homau fōtunga ‘i ho ‘ao mo e fōtunga ‘o e kau talavou ‘oku kai ‘a e ‘inasi ‘o e tu‘i; pea ke toki fai ki ho‘o kau tamaio‘eiki ko kimautolu, ‘o fakatatau ki ho‘o vakai.
Pea na‘a ne fakaongo kiate kinautolu ‘i he me‘a ko ia, ‘o ne ‘ahi‘ahi kinautolu ‘o ‘aho hongofulu.
Pea ‘i he ‘osi ‘a e ‘aho ‘e hongofulu, na‘e hā honau fofonga ‘oku nau faka‘ofo‘ofa mo sino ange ‘iate kinautolu na‘e tokoni mei he ‘inasi ‘o e tu‘i.
Ko ia na‘e ‘ave ‘e he sētuata ‘a e ‘inasi meiate kinautolu, mo honau uaine inu, ‘o ne ‘ange kiate kinautolu ‘a e mohuku kai pē.

Pea ko e tu‘unga talavou ‘e toko fā ko ia, na‘e ‘ange ki ai ‘e ‘Elohimi ‘a e poto mo e mafai ‘i he ngaahi tohi kotoa mo e ‘ilo me‘a: pea ko Tāniela na‘e ‘uhinga ki ai ‘a e ngaahi fa‘ahinga vīsone mo e misi.
Pea ‘i he ‘osi ‘a e taimi ‘a ia na‘e folofola ‘a e tu‘i ‘e toki ‘omi ai kinautolu, na‘e fakahū kinautolu ‘e he ‘eiki ‘o e kau ‘iunoke ki he ‘ao ‘o Nepukanesa.
Pea fefolofolai ‘a e tu‘i mo kinautolu, pea na‘e ‘ikai ‘i honau kotoa ha tatau mo Tāniela, ‘Ananaia, Misaeli, mo ‘Asalaia; ko ia na‘a nau fe‘ao mo e tu‘i.

Pea ka ai ha me‘a na‘e fehu‘i ki ai ‘e he tu‘i, ‘o kau ki he poto mo e fakakaukau, na‘a ne vakai ‘oku nau poto hake ‘o tātu‘ohongofulu ‘i he kau sikalaipe kotoa pē mo e kau maki ‘i hono pule‘anga kotoa.
Pea na‘e a‘u ‘a Tāniela ki he ‘uluaki ta‘u ‘o Kingi Kōlesi.
